event_text: m_c was running over the hills, when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} tripped over {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} own legs and hit the ground hard.
The ground inside the camp has turned into a muddy mess from the rain. m_c sprains {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} paw while trying to walk through the muck.
m_c is feeling extremely sore from the long distances {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'ve/'s} run lately.
Playfully following a butterfly outside the camp, m_c accidentally steps into a rabbit burrow, severely injuring {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} leg and letting out a yelp of pain.

history.scar: m_c was scarred when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} accidentally ran {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} leg into a rabbit burrow.
history.reg_death: m_c died from wounds caused by when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} accidentally ran into a rabbit burrow.
history.lead_death: died after stepping in a rabbit burrow

event_text: m_c was running around excitedly on patrol, when {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} paw landed right in a rabbit hole, twisting uncomfortably. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} limped the whole way home.
